016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.util;
017
018import static de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.ConfigurationHelper.configureApplication;
019import static de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.ConfigurationHelper.configureComponents;
020import static de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.ConfigurationHelper.configureManagedBeans;
021import static de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.ConfigurationHelper.configureRequestConfig;
022import static de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.ConfigurationHelper.extractJsfTestConfiguration;
023import static de.cuioss.tools.string.MoreStrings.emptyToNull;
024import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals;
025import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertNotNull;
026import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertTrue;
027
028import javax.faces.application.Application;
029import javax.faces.application.NavigationHandler;
030import javax.faces.context.ExternalContext;
031import javax.faces.context.FacesContext;
032import javax.faces.convert.EnumConverter;
033import javax.faces.convert.IntegerConverter;
034import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
035
036import org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockExternalContext22;
037import org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockFacesContext;
038import org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockFacesContext22;
039import org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockHttpServletResponse;
040import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach;
041
042import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.ApplicationConfigurator;
043import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.BeanConfigurator;
044import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.ComponentConfigurator;
045import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.JsfTestConfiguration;
046import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.RequestConfigurator;
047import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.decorator.ApplicationConfigDecorator;
048import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.decorator.BeanConfigDecorator;
049import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.decorator.ComponentConfigDecorator;
050import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.decorator.RequestConfigDecorator;
051import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.util.IdentityResourceBundle;
052import lombok.AccessLevel;
053import lombok.Getter;
054
055/**
056 * Base class for configuring the {@link FacesContext} provided by MyFaces-Test.
057 * The configuration is implemented using some kind of decorator pattern
058 * (roughly). The actual configuration relies on two sources:
059 * <ul>
060 * <li>It scans for the annotations of type {@link JsfTestConfiguration}
061 * instantiates the corresponding classes and configures the environment
062 * accordingly</li>
063 * <li>It checks whether the actual test-class implements one of
064 * {@link ApplicationConfigurator}, {@link BeanConfigurator},
065 * {@link RequestConfigurator} or {@link ComponentConfigurator} and calls the
066 * corresponding methods accordingly, <em>after</em> the configurator derived by
067 * the annotations</li>
068 * </ul>
069 * <p>
070 * The corresponding objects {@link ComponentConfigurator},
071 * {@link BeanConfigDecorator}, {@link RequestConfigDecorator} and
072 * {@link ApplicationConfigurator} can be accessed by the getter-methods, in
073 * case you need to configure elements for a certain test only.
074 * </p>
075 * <p>
076 * In addition there is a new way of dealing with localized messages for
077 * unit-tests. In essence there is the {@link IdentityResourceBundle}
078 * configured: This is helpful for tests where you want to ensure that a certain
079 * message key is used to create a message but do not want to test the actual
080 * ResourceBundle mechanism itself. It will always return the given key itself.
081 * As default this mechanism is active, you can change this by overwriting
082 * #isUseIdentityResouceBundle(). If it is active it is used as well for
083 * resolving the MessageBundle
084 * </p>
085 *
086 * @author Oliver Wolff
087 */
088@SuppressWarnings("squid:S2187") // owolff Base class for actual tests
089public class ConfigurableFacesTest {
090
091    /** "Location" */
092    public static final String LOCATION_HEADER = "Location";
093
094    @Getter(AccessLevel.PROTECTED)
095    private ComponentConfigDecorator componentConfigDecorator;
096
097    @Getter(AccessLevel.PROTECTED)
098    private BeanConfigDecorator beanConfigDecorator;
099
100    @Getter(AccessLevel.PROTECTED)
101    private ApplicationConfigDecorator applicationConfigDecorator;
102
103    @Getter
104    private RequestConfigDecorator requestConfigDecorator;
105
106    private ConfigurableApplication configurableApplication;
107
108    private final JsfRuntimeSetup runtimeSetup = new JsfRuntimeSetup();
109
110    /**
111     * See class documentation of {@link ConfigurableFacesTest} for details.
112     */
113    @BeforeEach
114    protected void setupAdditionalConfiguration() {
115        runtimeSetup.setUp();
116        configurableApplication = ConfigurableApplication.createWrapAndRegister((MockFacesContext) getFacesContext());
117        configurableApplication.setUseIdentityResouceBundle(isUseIdentityResourceBundle());
118
119        componentConfigDecorator = new ComponentConfigDecorator(getApplication(), getFacesContext());
120        beanConfigDecorator = new BeanConfigDecorator(getFacesContext());
121        applicationConfigDecorator = new ApplicationConfigDecorator(getApplication(), getFacesContext());
122        requestConfigDecorator = new RequestConfigDecorator((MockFacesContext22) getFacesContext(),
123                (MockExternalContext22) getExternalContext());
124
125        final var annotations = extractJsfTestConfiguration(getClass());
126        configureApplication(this, applicationConfigDecorator, annotations);
127        configureComponents(this, componentConfigDecorator, annotations);
128        configureManagedBeans(this, beanConfigDecorator, annotations);
129        configureRequestConfig(this, requestConfigDecorator, annotations);
130
131        // Fix for invalid set converter Id at
132        // org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockApplication@91
133        componentConfigDecorator.registerConverter(IntegerConverter.class, IntegerConverter.CONVERTER_ID);
134        // Enum converter is currently omitted.
135        componentConfigDecorator.registerConverter(EnumConverter.class, EnumConverter.CONVERTER_ID);
136        componentConfigDecorator.registerConverter(EnumConverter.class, Enum.class);
137
138        // Enable CuiMockConfigurableNavigationHandler to be used
139        getApplicationConfigDecorator().getMockNavigationHandler();
140    }
141
142    protected FacesContext getFacesContext() {
143        return runtimeSetup.getFacesContext();
144    }
145
146    protected Application getApplication() {
147        return configurableApplication;
148    }
149
150    protected ExternalContext getExternalContext() {
151        return runtimeSetup.getExternalContext();
152    }
153
154    protected MockHttpServletResponse getResponse() {
155        return runtimeSetup.getResponse();
156    }
157
158    protected boolean isUseIdentityResourceBundle() {
159        return true;
160    }
161
162    /**
163     * Asserts whether a navigation was handled by calling
164     * {@link NavigationHandler#handleNavigation(javax.faces.context.FacesContext, String, String)}
165     *
166     * @param outcome must not be null
167     */
168    public void assertNavigatedWithOutcome(final String outcome) {
169        assertNotNull(emptyToNull(outcome), "Outcome must not be null");
170        assertTrue(getFacesContext().getExternalContext().isResponseCommitted(), "Response is not committed");
171        var handler = getApplicationConfigDecorator().getMockNavigationHandler();
172        assertTrue(handler.isHandleNavigationCalled(), "handleNavigation is not called");
173        assertEquals(outcome, handler.getCalledOutcome());
174    }
175
176    /**
177     * Asserts whether a navigation was initialized by calling
178     * {@link ExternalContext#redirect(String)}
179     *
180     * @param redirectUrl must not be null
181     */
182    public void assertRedirect(final String redirectUrl) {
183        assertNotNull("redirectUrl must not be null", emptyToNull(redirectUrl));
184        assertTrue(getFacesContext().getExternalContext().isResponseCommitted(), "Response is not committed");
185        var tempResponse = (HttpServletResponse) getExternalContext().getResponse();
186        assertTrue(tempResponse.containsHeader(LOCATION_HEADER),
187                "Response must provide a header with the name " + LOCATION_HEADER);
188        assertEquals(redirectUrl, tempResponse.getHeader(LOCATION_HEADER));
189
190    }
191}
